poses.name: Centering Breath
poses.description: Begin your practice with mindful breathing to center yourself and prepare for the session.
poses.instructions: Sit comfortably with your spine straight. Close your eyes and take slow, deep breaths. Count 4 counts in, hold for 4, exhale for 6.

poses.name: Butterfly
poses.description: Gentle hip opener that opens the groin and inner thighs.
poses.instructions: Sit with soles of feet together, hold feet and gently fold forward from hips.

poses.name: Dragon
poses.description: Deep hip opener targeting quadriceps and hip flexors of the back leg, hip socket of the front leg.
poses.instructions: Begin on hands and knees or in Down Dog. Step one foot between hands. Walk front foot forward until knee is over heel. Slide back knee backward as far as comfortable.
contraindications: Can be uncomfortable for the kneecap or ankle - use padding or support as needed
Pregnant women may wish to avoid or not go so low due to sacroiliac joint stress

poses.name: Cat Pulling Its Tail
poses.description: Asymmetrical twist combining hip opening with spinal rotation.
poses.instructions: Lie on side, bend top knee and reach back to hold foot, creating twist through spine.

poses.name: Half-Butterfly
poses.description: Asymmetrical pose targeting one side at a time for focused hip opening.
poses.instructions: Sit with one leg straight, other foot drawn into inner thigh. Fold forward over straight leg.

poses.name: Reclining Twists
poses.description: Gentle supine twist wringing out the spine and promoting detoxification.
poses.instructions: Lie on back, bring knees to chest then drop to one side. Extend arms in T-shape.

poses.name: Savasana
poses.description: Final relaxation pose that integrates the practice and promotes deep rest.
poses.instructions: Lie flat on back with arms and legs comfortably apart. Close eyes and breathe naturally.
